BSc. Information & Communication Tech. student at GIMPA Hello, my name is Enoch Cobbina. I am a Bachelors of Science student in Information & Communication Technology at GIMPA, passionate about all thing Data Analytics and its applications in making informed decisions for organizations.
When I find the time, I code in R and share it on my blog.
